subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Gonzalo Fernández-Castaño grabbed the 54-hole lead in the Scottish Open with a seven-under 64 at Loch Lomond in Luss by taking advantage of mistakes by other players.
snippet: Gonzalo Fernández-Castaño grabbed the 54-hole lead in the Scottish Open with a seven-under 64 at Loch Lomond in Luss by taking advantage of mistakes by other players.
